text: Devegeçidi Dam is one of the 22 dams of the Southeastern Anatolia Project of Turkey, Diyarbakır. It is near Diyarbakır on a branch of the Tigris river.SpringerLink - Sinodiaptomus sarsi (Rylov, 1923) (Copepoda, Calanoida) in Turkey It was constructed for irrigation purposes between 1965 and 1972. ==Notes== ==References== * ==External links== * www.gap.gov.tr - Official GAP web site Category:Dams in Diyarbakır Province Category:Southeastern Anatolia Project Category:Buildings and structures in Diyarbakır Category:Dams completed in 1972 Category:Rock-filled dams Category:Dams in the Tigris River basin Category:Important Bird Areas of Turkey
title: Devegeçidi Dam
